General.Name: Kencana Agri Limited
General.Description: Kencana Agri Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a plantation company in Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. It engages in the cultivation of oil palms; processing of fresh fruit bunches into crude palm oil (CPO), crude palm kernel oil, palm kernel cake, and palm kernel; and provision of bulking and logistics services. It has oil palm plantations in Sumatra, Kalimantan, and Sulawesi regions of Indonesia. The company is also involved in the wholesale of plantation-related products; provision of support storage facilities; and transportation business. It markets and sells its products to trading companies, refineries, and oleochemical companies. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia. Kencana Agri Limited is a subsidiary of Kencana Holdings Pte. Ltd.
